duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute comprehensive strategies for PeopleSoft Financials implementations and enhancement engagements.
Understand module-specific tables, integration points, and data flow of General Ledger and Accounts Payables/Receivables.
Write technical design documents and create unit and regression test cases.
Provide strong hands-on experience in PeopleTools, including PeopleCode, Application Engine, and SQL.
Demonstrate excellent communication skills in conveying technical concepts effectively.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field (Master's preferred)
